item.title: The plane is ready, the fundraisers are booked: Trump's VP search comes down to its final days - The Associated Press
item.description:
1. The plane is ready, the fundraisers are booked: Trump's VP search comes down to its final days  The Associated Press
  2. Elise Stefanik has become a star in the GOP. Is it enough to be Trump's VP?  USA TODAY
  3. Trump's New Running Mate Imperative - WSJ  The Wall Street Journal
  4. Who might Donald Trump pick as his running-mate?  The Economist
  5. Trump’s VP rollout and convention planning complicated by Biden woes as former president looks to regain spotlight  CNN

item.title: Conditions at UK immigration removal centre ‘worst inspectors have seen’
item.description:
Report found ligature points previously used in suicide attempts at Harmondsworth had not been removed

The prisons watchdog has described “truly shocking” conditions in an immigration removal centre close to Heathrow airport as the worst its inspectors had ever seen.

His Majesty’s Inspectorate of Prisons has published a damning report on conditions at Harmondsworth, a 658-bed centre, the largest of its kind in Europe.

In the UK and Ireland, Samaritans can be contacted on freephone 116 123, or email jo@samaritans.org or jo@samaritans.ie. In the US, you can call or text the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline on 988, chat on 988lifeline.org, or text HOME to 741741 to connect with a crisis counselor. In Australia, the crisis support service Lifeline is 13 11 14. Other international helplines can be found at befrienders.org
